sentences.sContent: The topic of addiction remains something of a taboo in our family.
sentences.sCn: 毒瘾在我们家依然是个有些忌讳的话题。

remMethod.val: “特不” → 特别强调不准干的事 → 禁忌； 禁止

trans.tranOther: a custom that says you must avoid a particular activity or subject, either because it is considered offensive or because your religion does not allow it
a taboo subject, word, activity etc is one that people avoid because it is extremely offensive or embarrassing
